Services

Adding value to companies through strategic, operational, and financial guidance.

What We Do.

Our objective is to build extraordinary companies that will shape the future of the media, communications.

Private Equity

MIEquity pioneered a sector-focused approach to private equity investing with the vision that a dedicated team of industry experts could build exceptional companies of enduring value. Since the firm’s inception in 1989. MIEquity has invested in over 160 companies.

  • MIEquity pioneered a sector-focused approach to private equity investing with the vision.
  • That a dedicated team of industry experts could build exceptional.
  • Companies of enduring value. Since the firm’s inception in 1989.
  • MIEquity has invested in over 160 companies and become.
  • MIEquity firm focused on the media, communications, education and information industries.
